name: WKInterfaceObject
desc: An object that provides information that is common to all interface objects in your watchOS app.

items.name: func setHidden(Bool)
items.desc: Hides or shows the interface object in your user interface.

items.name: func setAlpha(CGFloat)
items.desc: Sets the opacity of the interface object.

items.name: var interfaceProperty: String
items.desc: The name of the outlet in your interface controller to which the object is bound.

items.name: func setWidth(CGFloat)
items.desc: Sets the absolute width (in points) of the object.

items.name: func setHeight(CGFloat)
items.desc: Sets the absolute height (in points) of the object.

items.name: func setRelativeWidth(CGFloat, withAdjustment: CGFloat)
items.desc: Sets the width of the object relative to its container.

items.name: func setRelativeHeight(CGFloat, withAdjustment: CGFloat)
items.desc: Sets the height of the object relative to its container.

items.name: func sizeToFitWidth()
items.desc: Sets the width of the object to fit its current content.

items.name: func sizeToFitHeight()
items.desc: Sets the height of the object so that it fills the available vertical space.

items.name: func setHorizontalAlignment(WKInterfaceObjectHorizontalAlignment)
items.desc: Sets the horizontal alignment of an object relative to its container’s bounds.

items.name: func setVerticalAlignment(WKInterfaceObjectVerticalAlignment)
items.desc: Sets the vertical alignment of an object relative to its container’s bounds.

items.name: func setAccessibilityIdentifier(String?)
items.desc: Sets the unique identifier string for the interface object.

items.name: func setAccessibilityLabel(String?)
items.desc: Sets a succinct label on the object that identifies the accessibility element.

items.name: func setAccessibilityHint(String?)
items.desc: Sets the description of what happens when performing an action on the accessibility element.

items.name: func setAccessibilityValue(String?)
items.desc: Sets the value of the accessibility element.

items.name: func setIsAccessibilityElement(Bool)
items.desc: Sets whether the object is an accessibility element that an assistive app can access.

items.name: func setAccessibilityTraits(UIAccessibilityTraits)
items.desc: Sets the combination of accessibility traits that best characterize the accessibility element.

items.name: func setAccessibilityImageRegions([WKAccessibilityImageRegion])
items.desc: Marks portions of an image as separate accessible elements.

items.name: func setSemanticContentAttribute(WKInterfaceSemanticContentAttribute)
items.desc: Sets the semantic description of the object’s contents, used to determine whether its content should be flipped when switching between left-to-right and right-to-left layouts.

items.name: enum WKInterfaceObjectHorizontalAlignment
items.desc: Constants for horizontally aligning objects in their container.

items.name: enum WKInterfaceObjectVerticalAlignment
items.desc: Constants for vertically aligning objects in their container.
